content.location: Start just right of the traverse start on large vertical face behind brain boulder.

content.description: Long traverse on vertical and roof sections.
content.location: Uphill behind the brain(first featurefull vertical Boulder at the island). Start on far left traverse right dropping under the overhung stuff and top out right of the overhang.

content.description: From jugs at head height, move past slopers to the cool bucket at the lip, then press out a fun mantel.
content.location: Just to the right of Wifebeater.

content.description: Start on a couple of sloping holds and make a move to a two finger pocket, get your feet up and get ready for the hardest part, cut your right foot, campus up to a bad sloper and stick it (HARD!), then match on the left side of the dip get your left foot up and make the super hard/crux mantle.
content.protection: Pads and spotter, the fall from this one sends you rolling down a hill if you don't have a great spotter. Watch your ankles landing on your pad, there is a ledgey rock hiding in there.
content.location: Left side of boulder, it is the one with lots O' chalk.

content.description: This boulder sits atop the little rise just behind the brain boulder and houses one of the most classic lines at the Draw, as well as many other fun lines that are worth warming up on over and over again.
